title: Pelargonin
content:
Pelargonin is an anthocyanin. It is the 3,5-O-diglucoside of pelargonidin.

Pelargonin is a pigment, found in barberries,[1] the petals of the scarlet pelargonium flower[2] pomegranates,[3] and red wine.[4]
